DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the feasibility and the security of early mobilization of infants in pediatric intensive care.
DOC.brief_title: Early Mobilization: Evaluation of Feasibility and Security in Pediatric Intensive Care Unit
DOC.criteria: cardiorespiratory stability between 24 and 48h post admission Thorax open ECLS High frequency oscillatory ventilation
